data.title: Oliver Platt: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Oliver Platt: Check out the list of all Oliver Platt movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Oliver Platt news on Times of India.
data.text:
FX moves up release date for "The Bear" season 3 by three hours

etimes.in / Jun 25, 2024, 11:24 (IST)

​Good news for fans of "The Bear"! FX has announced that the release of Season 3 will be three hours earlier than originally planned. All episodes of the new season will now be available.​Season 3 continues the story of Carmy (played by Jeremy Allen White), Sydney (Ayo Edebiri), and their team as they strive to make their new restaurant, The Bear, successful. Following the dramatic opening night in Season 2, their goal is now to earn a Michelin star. However, running a restaurant is tough, and Carmy is no stranger to the intense pressures and challenges of the industry

The 10 best Thanksgiving movies you can watch this Holiday season

etimes.in / Oct 13, 2023, 12:26 (IST)

Get ready for a Thanksgiving movie binge watch session! These classics offer something for everyone during the holiday season. From Arlo's trash-dumping adventures in "Alice's Restaurant" to the shocking family revelations in "Hannah And Her Sisters," and the romantic dilemmas of Nola Darling in "She's Gotta Have It," you'll find the perfect tale to enjoy with your loved ones. Join Neal and Del's misadventures in "Planes, Trains and Automobiles," witness a Polish Jewish immigrant family's struggles in "Avalon," and unravel the deep mysteries in "Scent Of a Woman."

Graham is Broadway's New Doll

Mar 06, 2009, 12:11 (IST)

At her first rehearsal for her Broadway debut in ``Guys and Dolls,'' the star of TV's long-running ``Gilmore Girls'' felt a twinge of insecurity when the actors were asked how many times they've been cast in a Broadway show.
